categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The Endor Forest Ranger was a single-operator repulsorlift vehicle used by the Rebel Alliance. It featured a closed gyroscopic cockpit and was controlled by a single driver. It had two large blaster cannons for firing sideways, as well as two smaller, front-firing cannons.
The Endor Forest Ranger was utilized by the Rebel Alliance during the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY.
The Endor Forest Ranger was part of Kenner's Mini-Rig line. It was part of the last set released, debuting in 1984. According to the toy's packaging, this vehicle was used on Endor.
Besides Star Wars, the vehicle's design also appeared in Marvel Comics' New Mutants Special Edition #1 in 1985, when the "techno-organic" character Warlock briefly transforms himself into a vehicle.
